tools.name: brain_dump_organize
tools.description: Transform unstructured thoughts into a structured markdown todolist using the IDE's LLM. Input your project description and thoughts to get an organized task list.

tools.name: enhance_todolist
tools.description: Enhance an existing todolist with detailed specifications, acceptance criteria, and technical requirements using the IDE's LLM.

tools.name: find_next_task
tools.description: Identify the next logical unchecked task to implement from the todolist, based on dependencies and complexity.

tools.name: plan_task_implementation
tools.description: Create a detailed implementation plan for a specific task, including architecture, dependencies, and testing strategies.

tools.name: task_executor
tools.description: Execute a planned task by implementing the necessary file operations based on the implementation plan. Use validate_plan=true to preview actions without executing them.

tools.name: mark_task_complete
tools.description: Mark a specific task as complete in the todolist, updating its status from unchecked to checked.

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create a new file with the specified content in the workspace. Supports various file types and formats.

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Edit an existing file by applying changes such as replacing text, appending content, prepending content, or inserting at a specific line.

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from the workspace. Use with caution as this operation cannot be undone.

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move a file from one location to another within the workspace, optionally overwriting existing files.

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Copy a file from one location to another within the workspace, optionally overwriting existing files.

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory in the workspace, optionally creating parent directories if they don't exist.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List the contents of a directory in the workspace, showing files and subdirectories with size information.

tools.name: delete_directory
tools.description: Delete a directory from the workspace, with optional recursive deletion for non-empty directories.

tools.name: batch_operations
tools.description: Execute multiple file/directory operations in a single batch for efficiency, with optional dry run capability.
